data.message: Could anyone tell me how to make a video with this?? #friendship

replies.message: Hey Ðhïmítrí. You can find your video at http://on.fb.me/1URdd92. You can also see your Friends Day Video by clicking "Watch Yours" below a friend’s Friends Day Video. Thanks! -Jordan
I have tried that but somethink was there:"Sorry,we don't have enought content to make a Friends Day video for you."
